Total_weight_prn
================

.. table:: Algorithm
   :widths: 15 15 15

   +------------------------+-----------------------------------+-----------------------------------------+
   | **Algorithm Name**     | **What is this algorithm for?**   | **Description**                         |
   +========================+===================================+=========================================+
   | total_weight_prn       | Cost Element                      | Unit cost of total weight by portion.   |
   +------------------------+-----------------------------------+-----------------------------------------+
